title: Kanban Board
description: A simple Kanban board application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Weather Application
description: A weather application that allows users to search for current weather conditions and forecasts for any location.

title: Timed Quiz
description: A timed quiz application that tests users' knowledge on Javascript. Users can select a category and answer multiple-choice questions within a time limit.

title: Database Manager
description: A command line application that allows users to manage a database. Users can perform CRUD operations and query the database using commands.
